label: 北倉
本: Exhibition of Shōsō-in Treasures , The 52nd  . Nara National Museum . 2000
説明文: The northern division within the Hōko (Treasure Repository) , in the Shōsō-in at Tōdai-ji in Nara. Like the South Section, this section is built with the azekura (loghouse) construction method. The North Section contains many objects used personally by Emperor Shōmu, which were donated to the Great Buddha of Tōdai-ji after his death by his wife, Empress Kōmyō. [宝庫、正倉院、東大寺、校倉、聖武、光明]
